name: Reptilians World War
description:
This is the demo of my game, Reptilians World War, I'm doing it Solo, meaning I do all the art, code & design of the project, also I do some ramen to maintain my focus :), your feedback is very welcome at this stage of the game I hope you enjoy the demo and have good memories playing it. First of all thanks for reaching this game! :)

Reptilians world war demo features the wip first level of the game. You can check out our kickstarter at: goo.gl/WYKesh and you can see 1 month development progress.

WIP level looks like this:

It is half length at the moment and I plan to add additional gameplay / enemies to it, but you can get some fun trying to get the best score on this demo.

I'll update demo as soon as I improve it even more.

* This demo contains WIP material, it doesn't entitle for final game and it will be updated at developer discretion.
